Hi Malikjee,

I have downloaded many a classic movie offered by you and thank you for such a gr8 service.

I am for following movie:-



Shehar Aur Sapna (The City and the Dream) is 1963 Hindi film directed by Khwaja Ahmad Abbas. It was based on Abbas's own story.



I saw it in Mumbai in 1963 and found it to be very moving.

I would like to see it again but could not find anywhere.

If you could upload and let me when when you upload I will be very thankfull to you.

Thanks
